# ShowHidden enumeration

Values for the Invoke-AltCover -ShowStatic option

```csharp
public enum ShowHidden
```

## Values

| name | value | description |
| --- | --- | --- |
| KeepHidden | `0` | default, don't show code ignored in static analysis |
| Mark | `1` | show code ignored in static analysis with a special negative visit count if not visited |
| Reveal | `2` | treat the code as normal |
